name: Outer Isles
role_in_state: Maritime outposts and repair/ritual resource hubs
economy_niches: ritual reagent harvesting and primary processing
seaweed gardens and coastal market produce
culture_adjustments: tighter control of navigational augury by island ritualists
tide- and moon-festivals amplified into local rites
pragmatic thrift: craft skills prized over scholastic trade
constraints: volatile reagent stocks for ritual workshops
notes: serves as waystations for coastal trade lanes
important source of exported ritual components and repair services
